bonus.value: Increase damage dealt by 14%/16%/18%/20% when there are no enemies within 4 meters.
Upon a headshot or hitting the target with Icewind Arrow: Piercing Shot, increase ATK by 15%/18%/21%/25% for 8 seconds.

mind.name: Weather Vane
mind.desc: "The wind blows." That sums up every cause for leaving and setting off again.

memory.name: Gravitator
memory.desc: She's always moving about and only stays in the spot she had thoroughly scouted.

belief.name: Drifter
belief.desc: How can you tell which faith is the right one? Answer: The one that ultimately emerges victorious.
